message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $95. It's a great deal, and I think you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I can only pay up to $85. Let me know if this works for you!

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer, but I need to make a bit more on this sale. How about we split the difference and go with $90? It's still a good price for you, and it allows me to make a fair profit.
